public void addMethod(java.lang.String methodName,

                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> preConditions,
                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> postConditions)
A new prototype method is added to the manager.

Parameters:
methodName - Name of the new method
description - Brief description of new method
type - Type of new method
competencies - Competencies what this method is useful for
subtasks - List of subtasks that generate this method in case of being a DECOMPOSITION method
params - IN parameters needed by this method
